title: 和工程师讨论技术可行性
situation: Engineer says the current architecture can't support a feature. You ask for a workaround.

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 这个用现有架构实现不了。
turns.pinyin: Zhège yòng xiànyǒu jiàgòu shíxiàn bù liǎo.
turns.translation: This can't be implemented with the current architecture.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 有没有折中方案？我们可以先做一个简化版。
turns.pinyin: Yǒu méiyǒu zhézhōng fāng'àn? Wǒmen kěyǐ xiān zuò yī ge jiǎnhuà bǎn.
turns.translation: Is there a workaround? We could do a simplified version first.
suggestions: 有没有折中方案？我们可以先做一个简化版。

turns.speaker: partner
turns.text: 简化版的话，可能达不到你们要的效果。
turns.pinyin: Jiǎnhuà bǎn de huà, kěnéng dá bù dào nǐmen yào de xiàoguǒ.
turns.translation: A simplified version might not meet your expectations.

turns.speaker: user
turns.text: 先验证一下用户需求，再决定要不要做大版本。
turns.pinyin: Xiān yànzhèng yīxià yònghù xūqiú, zài juédìng yào bu yào zuò dà bǎnběn.
turns.translation: Let's validate user needs first, then decide whether to build the full version.
suggestions: 先验证一下用户需求，再决定要不要做大版本。
先小范围试试，再考虑完整版。
